alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 3:28AM CDT until May 06 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL MOBILE COUNTY... At 328 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Semmes to near Tillmans Corner to 4 miles southwest of Coden to 8 miles south of Petit Bois Island, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Dauphin Island, Axis, I65 And I165, Coden, I65 And AL 158, I10 And I65 and Alabama Port. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
